item.title: What Happens When People Don’t Understand How AI Works - The Atlantic
item.description:
1. What Happens When People Don’t Understand How AI Works  The Atlantic
  2. Scariest AI reality: Companies don't fully understand their models  Axios
  3. 'Foolhardy at best, and deceptive and dangerous at worst': Don't believe the hype — here's why artificial general intelligence isn't what the billionaires tell you it is  Live Science
  4. AI's biggest threat isn't what you'd think - here's how to protect yourself  ZDNet
  5. The Best Thing About AI? It Still Needs You to Make It Work  Lifewire
